valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sat 13 Sep 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 14 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low expected 100 miles west of Rockall 981 by midday Sunday. Low Hebrides 996 losing its identity
